####  Hours 

###### Tuesday 

10am - 4pm  

###### Wednesday

10am - 4pm  

###### Thursday

10am - 4pm

###### FRIDAY

10am - 4pm

###### Saturday

10am - 4pm

###### Sunday

12pm - 4pm

_*We will be closed on the following holidays: Good Friday, Easter Sunday, Independence Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day,__New Year's Eve & New Year's Day. _

####  Admissions

###### New Unified Admission Tickets

Provides admission to all museums in the Historic Trust museum complex for seven (7) days

###### Adults

$12

###### Children (ages 3-14)

$7

###### Seniors (65+) / AAA Members / Military

$11

###### UWF Alumni Members

$11

###### PMA Members

FREE

###### UWF STUDENTS

FREE

###### CHILDREN (UNDER 3)

FREE

###### SNAP / EBT

FREE

_*If you are purchasing a discounted ticket you must show supporting documents (AAA Member Card, DOD credentials, or SNAP/EBT card with ID card) at check in at one of our Visitor Service Desks. For more information on SNAP/EBT benefits, visit _[MyFLFamilies.com](https://www.myflfamilies.com/)__

[Purchase tickets here](https://ecom.roller.app/uwfhistorictrust/admissiontickets/en-us/home)
